thread.section_title: ScreenCountry Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenCountry Inc | www.screencountry.com
thread.title: gbrees

author: gbrees
title: gbrees
text: I build and fix computers for a hobby, being retired. I don't have to replace screens very often, but when I do I go to ScreenCountry.com. They were the first place I went to, years ago. I have never experienced any problems with the screens I've purchased from them and they ship very quickly. Usually, in a couple of days, I will receive the new screen. I have replaced many different brands of screens, all without a hitch. They are my "goto" company.
